content.question: Which of the following would be most likely to increase life expectancy in a less developed country, resulting in an aging population in that country?

choices.label: An increase in the country’s birth rate
Improvements in transportation and communication networks
Improvements in access to health care and sanitation
A decrease in the country’s total fertility rate

content.answer: Improvements in access to health care and sanitation

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain a likely outcome in a geographic scenario using geographic concepts, processes, models, or theories.
